name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_on_coe_days_days
title: Days before COE to close escrow on buyer's property
label: COE Days
description: Within how many days before COE of seller's property will you close escrow on the sale of your property?
tips: Consider the time needed to coordinate both closings and allow for potential delays. Five (5) days is the standard timeframe.
small_print: Five days should provide plenty of time for due process to take place and allow both transactions to close without delay. Typically once recordation of the transfer is completed at the County level, things move relatively quickly as far as transfer of funds, etc. The specified number of days will be included in your purchase agreement and will be legally binding.

internal.notes: Days before COE to close buyer's property

contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_o.name: contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_on_coe_days_days
contingency_sell_buyer_property_waived_o.tooltip: Enter number of days before COE
